name: Nocturne: The Dragon's Melody
description:
Return to the world of Nocturne, in the thrilling sequel to "Nocturne and The Unseen Dream". The infamous Jack von Bitterschädel's music box has been stolen and its up to you (Benny Macready (Not you, you're pathetic)) to find out who stole it and get it back!

Learn the deeper lore and secrets to the characters and world of Nocturne, as you plunge the depths of the underwater city of Pacifia! Experience the upgraded technology of the 487, with higher tech graphics*, stunning computer voice technology, and a story that computer magazines are already calling "Really something"!

*graphics are the exact same quality
